import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { HiCurrencyRupee, HiShoppingBag, HiClipboardList, HiPencil, HiTrash } from 'react-icons/hi'; const RestaurantDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('orders'); const orders = [ { id: 1, customer: "John Doe", items: "Margherita Pizza x2", total: 598, status: "Pending", time: "10:30 AM" }, { id: 2, customer: "Jane Smith", items: "Farmhouse Pizza x1", total: 299, status: "Preparing", time: "10:15 AM" }, { id: 3, customer: "Mike Johnson", items: "Pepperoni Pizza x3", total: 897, status: "Ready", time: "10:00 AM" } ]; const menuItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Margherita Pizza", price: 299, category: "Pizza", available: true }, { id: 2, name: "Farmhouse Pizza", price: 399, category: "Pizza", available: true }, { id: 3, name: "Garlic Bread", price: 149, category: "Sides", available: false } ]; return (

{user?.name}

Restaurant Dashboard

Today's Revenue

₹4,590

+15% from yesterday

Orders Today

24

+5 from yesterday

Menu Items

{menuItems.length}

{menuItems.filter(item => item.available).length} Available

{activeTab === 'orders' ? (
{orders.map((order) => ( ))}
Order ID Customer Items Total Status Time Action
#{order.id} {order.customer} {order.items} ₹{order.total} {order.status} {order.time}
) : (

Menu Items

{menuItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.category}

₹{item.price}

))}
)}
); }; export default RestaurantDashboard;
